metadata.name: bingo
metadata.description: Solana bingo platform with quiz rooms and prize distribution

docs: All instruction handlers are implemented in the instructions module.
This keeps lib.rs clean and follows Anchor's recommended project structure.

instructions.name: add_approved_token
docs: Add a token to the approved list
* `token_mint` - Public key of the token mint to approve
* `TokenAlreadyApproved` - If token is already in the registry
* `TokenRegistryFull` - If registry is at capacity (50 tokens)

instructions.name: add_prize_asset
docs: Add prize asset to asset-based room
Deposits a prize asset into the room's prize vault.
* `Unauthorized` - If caller is not the host
* `InvalidRoomStatus` - If room is not in asset-based mode
* `PrizeAlreadyDeposited` - If prize has already been deposited

instructions.name: cleanup_room
docs: Cleanup room and reclaim rent (host or admin)
Closes ended room accounts and reclaims rent. Only works if vault is empty.
* `Unauthorized` - If caller is not host or admin

accounts.name: room_vault
docs: Room vault token account (must be empty)

instructions.name: close_joining
docs: Close joining for a room (host only)
Prevents new players from joining while allowing existing game to continue.
* `Unauthorized` - If caller is not the host

instructions.name: declare_winners
docs: Declare winners for a room (must be called before end_room)
* `winners` - Vector of winner public keys (1-10 winners)
* `Unauthorized` - If caller is not the host
* `InvalidRoomStatus` - If room is not in valid state
* `WinnersAlreadyDeclared` - If winners have already been declared
* `InvalidWinners` - If winner count is invalid or host is in winners list
* `InvalidPlayerEntry` - If winner did not join the room

instructions.name: end_room
docs: End room and distribute prizes to winners
* `winners` - Vector of winner public keys (used if winners not pre-declared)
* `remaining_accounts` - Winner token accounts for prize distribution
* `InvalidRoomStatus` - If room is not in Active status
* `Unauthorized` - If caller is not the host (unless room is expired)
* `HostCannotBeWinner` - If host is in winners list
* `InvalidTokenOwner` - If token owner doesn't match winner

accounts.name: room_vault
docs: Room vault token account (source of funds)

accounts.name: platform_token_account
docs: Platform wallet token account (receives platform fees)

accounts.name: charity_token_account
docs: Charity wallet token account (receives charity donations)
IMPORTANT: This account is NOT validated against GlobalConfig.charity_wallet.
The frontend can pass ANY valid SPL TokenAccount, enabling support for:
- The Giving Block (TGB) dynamic wallet addresses (different address per transaction)
- Custom charity wallets per-room or per-transaction
Security: Anchor validates this is a valid TokenAccount, but the owner wallet
is not restricted. This provides flexibility for dynamic charity routing.

accounts.name: host_token_account
docs: Host wallet token account (receives host fees)
Must be owned by the room host

instructions.name: init_asset_room
docs: Creates a room where prizes are pre-deposited assets rather than pool-based.
* `room_id` - Unique identifier for the room (max 32 bytes)
* `entry_fee` - Amount players must pay to join
* `prize_1_mint` - Token mint for first place prize
* `prize_2_mint` - Optional token mint for second place prize
* `prize_2_amount` - Optional amount for second place prize
* `prize_3_mint` - Optional token mint for third place prize
* `prize_3_amount` - Optional amount for third place prize

instructions.name: init_pool_room
docs: Create a pool-based room where prizes come from entry fee pool
* `room_id` - Unique identifier for the room (max 32 bytes)
* `entry_fee` - Amount players must pay to join (in token base units)
* `first_place_pct` - First place prize percentage (must sum to 100 with others)
* `expiration_slots` - Optional expiration in slots (0 = no expiration)
* `CharityBelowMinimum` - If charity allocation would be below 40%
* `InvalidPrizeDistribution` - If prize percentages don't sum to 100

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program for token account initialization

instructions.name: initialize
docs: * `platform_wallet` - Wallet address that receives platform fees

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin account that will own the configuration

instructions.name: join_room
docs: Join a room by paying entry fee
* `extras_amount` - Optional additional donation (100% goes to charity)
* `RoomNotReady` - If room is not in Ready/Active status
* `JoiningClosed` - If room is no longer accepting players

accounts.name: player_entry
docs: Player entry PDA - prevents duplicate joins

accounts.name: room_vault
docs: Room vault token account - receives player's entry fee tokens.
Properly typed as TokenAccount to ensure correct account validation.

instructions.name: recover_room
docs: Allows admin to recover funds from abandoned rooms and refund players.
* `room_id` - Unique identifier for the room to recover
* `InsufficientBalance` - If room has no funds to recover

accounts.name: room_vault
docs: Room vault token account (source of refunds)

accounts.name: platform_token_account
docs: Platform wallet token account (receives recovery fee)

instructions.name: remove_approved_token
docs: Remove a token from the approved list
* `token_mint` - Public key of the token mint to remove
* `TokenNotApproved` - If token is not in the registry

instructions.name: set_emergency_pause
docs: Circuit breaker to halt all contract operations in case of security incident.
* `paused` - True to pause, false to unpause

instructions.name: update_global_config
docs: All parameters are optional - only provided values will be updated
* `Unauthorized` - If caller is not admin or upgrade authority

errors.name: TokenAlreadyApproved
errors.msg: Token is already in the approved registry

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Token account mint does not match room token mint

errors.name: InvalidTokenOwner
errors.msg: Token account owner does not match expected winner

errors.name: WinnersAlreadyDeclared
errors.msg: Winners have already been declared for this room

errors.name: PrizesNotFullyFunded
errors.msg: All prizes must be deposited before players can join

errors.name: RoomNotAbandoned
errors.msg: Room cannot be recovered yet (not abandoned)

errors.name: InvalidPlayerEntry
errors.msg: Invalid player entry (winner did not join the room)

errors.name: InvalidVaultAccount
errors.msg: Invalid vault account (must be a valid TokenAccount)

errors.name: InvalidVaultAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid vault authority (vault must be owned by room PDA)

errors.name: JoiningClosed
errors.msg: Room is no longer accepting new players

errors.name: VaultNotEmpty
errors.msg: Vault must be empty before cleanup

types.name: AssetRoomCreated
docs: Emitted when a new asset-based room is created
Asset rooms use pre-deposited prizes instead of pool splitting.

fields.name: room
docs: PDA address of the created asset room

types.name: EmergencyPauseToggled
docs: Emitted when emergency pause is toggled by admin

types.name: GlobalConfig
docs: This singleton PDA defines the economic constraints and wallet routing
for all fundraising rooms. Created once during program initialization.

fields.name: max_host_fee_bps
docs: Maximum host fee in basis points (500 = 5%)

fields.name: max_prize_pool_bps
docs: Maximum prize pool in basis points (3500 = 35%)

fields.name: min_charity_bps
docs: Minimum charity allocation in basis points (4000 = 40%)

types.name: JoiningClosed
docs: Emitted when host closes joining for a room

types.name: PlayerEntry
docs: Immutable receipt of a player joining a specific room, tracking exact
payment amounts and timing. One per player per room.

types.name: PlayerJoined
docs: Emitted when a player joins a room
Enables real-time player count updates and participation tracking.

fields.name: player_count
docs: Current number of players in room after this join

types.name: PrizeAsset
docs: Asset prize information for asset-based rooms

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of tokens for this prize

fields.name: deposited
docs: Whether this prize has been deposited/escrowed

types.name: PrizeAssetDeposited
docs: Emitted when a prize asset is deposited into an asset-based room
Tracks deposit of pre-determined prizes for asset mode.

fields.name: room
docs: Room PDA receiving the prize asset

fields.name: prize_index
docs: Index of the prize (0 = 1st place, 1 = 2nd place, etc.)

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint address of the deposited asset

types.name: PrizeAssetWithdrawn
docs: Emitted when a prize asset is withdrawn (undeposited) from an asset-based room
Only host can withdraw before room starts.

fields.name: room
docs: Room PDA from which asset was withdrawn

fields.name: prize_index
docs: Index of the prize that was withdrawn

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint address of withdrawn asset

types.name: Room
docs: Individual game room state and configuration
Tracks all financial and state information for a single fundraising game.
Created by hosts via init_pool_room, becomes immutable after ending.

fields.name: charity_wallet
docs: Charity wallet address (per-room, from The Giving Block or custom)
Receives the charity portion of entry fees + 100% of extras

fields.name: entry_fee
docs: Entry fee amount in token base units

fields.name: total_collected
docs: Total amount collected from all players

fields.name: joining_closed
docs: Whether new players can join (host can close joining early)

fields.name: expiration_slot
docs: Slot when room expires (0 = no expiration)

fields.name: winners
docs: Declared winners (1-10, set by declare_winners instruction)

fields.name: prize_assets
docs: Prize assets for asset-based rooms (None for pool-based rooms)

types.name: RoomCleaned
docs: Emitted when a room is cleaned up and vaults closed

fields.name: rent_reclaimed
docs: Rent lamports reclaimed from vault closure

types.name: RoomCreated
docs: Emitted when a new fundraising room is created
Allows frontends to display new rooms immediately and indexers to track all rooms.

fields.name: room
docs: PDA address of the created room

fields.name: entry_fee
docs: Entry fee amount in token's base units

fields.name: expiration_slot
docs: Slot number when room expires (0 = no expiration)

types.name: RoomEnded
docs: Emitted when a room ends and funds are distributed
Critical for verifying transparent fund distribution and charitable impact.

fields.name: winners
docs: List of winner wallet addresses (1-3 winners)

fields.name: charity_amount
docs: Amount sent to charity (includes all extras)

fields.name: prize_amount
docs: Total prize pool distributed to winners

fields.name: total_players
docs: Total number of players who participated

types.name: RoomRecovered
docs: Emitted when a room is recovered by admin
Emergency recovery for stuck funds or abandoned rooms.

types.name: TokenApproved
docs: Emitted when a token is approved by admin
Tracks which SPL tokens are allowed for entry fees.

types.name: TokenRegistry
docs: Token registry containing allowlist of approved SPL tokens

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin who can modify the registry

types.name: TokenRemoved
docs: Emitted when a token is removed from approved list
Admin can revoke token approval if needed.

types.name: WinnersDeclared
docs: Emitted when winners are declared for a room
Separates winner declaration from fund distribution for transparency.

fields.name: room
docs: Room PDA for which winners were declared
